original_text: But when an ostrich begins to run, it can run very fast. It can run faster than a horse and someone who rides on it. But when an ostrich begins to run, it can run very fast. It can run faster than a horse and someone who rides on it. But when an ostrich begins to run,
korean_text: 그러나 그것이 몸을 떨쳐 뛰어갈 때에는 말과 그 위에 탄 자를 우습게 여기느니라
